short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Craft your own avatar and explore a massive playground teeming with quests and mysteries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unravel secrets on diverse islands, from the dusty Wild West to mythical Ancient Greece.

Challenge yourself with puzzles and unique adventures on each island. Poptropica isn't just a solo exploration! Team up with fellow characters, visit their creations, and even trade cool items.
